title: Grill Makers Are the Hottest Things in IPOs
itunes:title: Grill Makers Are the Hottest Things in IPOs
description:
Dr. Justin Zaghi, Chief Medical Officer at Heal, discusses the severity of the Covid-19 delta variant. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Deals Reporter Crystal Tse talk about grill makers taking advantage of soaring sales to go public. Bloomberg New Economy Editorial Director Andy Browne discusses the U.S. and key allies blaming China for the recent Microsoft hack. And we Drive to the Close with Deepak Puri, CIO Americas at Deutsche Bank Wealth Management.

Hosts: Carol Massar. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
